result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: The 10/26/2022 Hearing has been rescheduled to ADA Delgao's week by the Court.

09:08 AM
Defendant, Todd P. Larsen, appeared with Attorney David E. Celebre.  Defendant in custody.
Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the Prosecution.
Court Reporter:  Kimberly Keel.  Clerk:  JM.
MINUTES:
22CF603 & 22CM570:
Victim rights compliance on 22CM570.
Defense Attorney requesting an adjournment, needs more time.
Matter set over, bond continued.
Status conference scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 09:30 am.
*Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Joshua P. and Brea Z.

10:19 AM
Defendant Todd P. Larsen appeared with Attorney David E. Celebre.  Defendant in custody.
Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the Prosecution.  DAR Reporter:  Sage Smith.  Clerk:  JM.
MINUTES:
Court amends the cash bond down to $2,000 cash bond w/same conditions.
Next hrg:  PTC 9/6/2022 at 9:00 am.
Copy of amended cash bond given to deputy in  court.
Bond Motion set for 8/19/2022 at 10:15 am.
and Affidavit to Modify Bond.

Defendant Todd P. Larsen appeared with Attorney David E. Celebre.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Brendaliz Valdes appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Case bound over.   Information filed, reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.

100PM Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney David Celebre by zoom.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   Preliminary Hearing set on July 12, 2022 at 9:30 a.m. before Comm, 927-54th Street, Room 157, Kenosha, WI. Bond continued with same conditions as previously set (see prior bond entry). mi
Atty David Celebre

Defendant Todd P. Larsen in court, in custody.   Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE wants an attorney to represent him and states SPD says he is eligible.    SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation.
Preliminary hearing on May 26, 2022 at 10:30 am.

02:00 PM   State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.  Defendant appeared in custody.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 10:30 am.  Bond continued w/ same conditions (see bond entry). mi
No Attorney Assigned - applicant is not eligible - SPD has not secured representation

08:31 AM Defendant Todd P. Larsen in court, in custody.  Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES:  22CF603/22CM570. DE is not eligible for SPD appointment, but states that he was employed when he applied last. DE is no longer employed; Court advises the DE to reapply with SPD. Court holds colloquy with DE and finds good cause to waive time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for May 20, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
SPD-Not Eligible

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Joshua P. and Brea Z.
